item.title: About
item.description: Illustration from the anime Hellsing Hellsing is a manga created by Kotoy Hirano. It was first published in the Japanese magazine Young King OURs in 1997 and completed in September 2008. Individual chapters are collected in tankobones and released by Shonen Gahosha Publishing house in Japan. In March 2009, all chapters of the manga were published in 10 volumes. The story tells about the secret organization “Hellsing” and its struggle against supernatural forces threatening Great Britain.

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service.
